title: John Saves Fusco (Person of Interest)(1 x 15)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: I love the song in this scene . Its Fever Ray -  If i had a heart .
Great scene, very dark, adds a lot of depth to the character of Detective Fusco and also to Mr. Reese as well.
Man I wished this show never ended
Plz who sings this song??its zoulou
description:
John saves Fusco after he is captured by a corrupt internal affairs detective.
